content:
Te burvīgs rīks, kā praktiski mācīties Overpass.
Diemžēl laika gaitā mazliet salūzis, ap sesto soli lietas nestrādā.

Es nezinu, ko īsti dara GIT studenti, bet man niezētu pirksti šo ņemt kā projektu kādā darbā :)

Overpass kā spēle

https://osmlab.github.io/learnoverpass
https://mastodon.social/@richlv/110712999015699852

Rihards Olups (@richlv@mastodon.social)
Attached: 1 image There’s this absolutely marvelous tool that offers Overpass tutorial with a storytelling approach. You get hints at how queries should be modified, and can try them out against real data, progressing as you find new bits of information from #OpenStreetMap data. https://osmlab.github.io/learnoverpass
